title: Instructional Design Technology (IDT) Application Workshop for Multicultural Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Learning Experience and General Understanding of Multicultural Environments
context.additional_context: Corporate internal program for language education vocational enhancement requiring culturally contextualized instructional material development

learning_goals: Learners can analyze instructional design frameworks reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners develop at least one language education scenario considering intercultural communication barriers
Learners can assess the cultural appropriateness of educational materials by applying survey-based qualitative research methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
